OptionDisplayGroup.name: groupGregtechOres
OptionDisplayGroup.Description: Enable/disable ores for certain metals and other substances.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenOres
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Gregtech Ores

OptionChoice.name: GTGenCoal
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Huge Veins of Coal and Lignite

OptionChoice.name: GTGenTetrahedrite
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Large Veins of Tetrahedrite, Stibnite, and Copper

OptionChoice.name: GTGenCassiterite
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Large Veins of Cassiterite, Tin, and Sphalerite

OptionChoice.name: GTGenBismuth
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Normal Veins of Bismuth and Barite

OptionChoice.name: GTGenMagnetite
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Large Veins of Magnetite, VandaiumMagnetite, and Gold

OptionChoice.name: GTGenSalt
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Large Veins of Salt, RockSalt, Lepidolite, Spodumene, and Lithium

OptionChoice.name: GTGenSaltpeter
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Large Veins of Saltpeter, Niter, and Calcite

OptionChoice.name: GTGenApatite
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Large Veins of Apatite, Phosphate, and Phosphorus

OptionChoice.name: GTGenQuartz
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Large Veins of CertusQuartz, Quartzite, and Nether Quartz

OptionChoice.Description: Generate Large Veins of Bauxite and Aluminum

OptionChoice.name: GTGenTitanium

OptionChoice.Description: Generate Huge Veins of BrownLimonite, YellowLimonite, and Malachite

OptionChoice.name: GTGenChalcopyrite
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Large Veins of Chalcopyrite, Iron, and Copper

OptionChoice.name: GTGenLead
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Large Veins of Lead, Galena, and AstralSilver

OptionChoice.Description: Generate Normal Veins of Pentlandite, Garnierite, Cobaltite, Nickel, and Cobalt

OptionChoice.Description: Generate Normal Veins of Almandine, Pyrope, GreenSapphire, and Aluminum

OptionChoice.name: GTGenMagnesium
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Normal Veins of Chrysotile, Asbestos, Bentonite, Olivine, and Magnesium

OptionChoice.Description: Generate Normal Veins of Pyrolusite, Spessartine, and Manganese

OptionChoice.Description: Generate Normal Veins of Molybdenum, Wulfenite, Powellite, and Molybdenum

OptionChoice.Description: Generate Normal Veins of Tantalite, Tantalum, and Niobium

OptionChoice.Description: Generate Normal Veins of Chromite, Uvarovite, YellowGarnet, and Chrome

OptionChoice.Description: Generate Normal Veins of Monazite, Bastnasite, Neodymium, and Thorium

OptionChoice.Description: Generate Large Veins of Thorium, Beryllium, Emerald

OptionChoice.Description: Generate Large Veins of Pitchblende and Uraninite
